title: Cascais, Portugal
description: In January 2019 I went to Cascais to attend POPL.

photos.alt: A town across a small bay in the morning.

photos.description: A pretty pink sunrise. Those three lights on the building are a nice accent too.
photos.alt: A cloudy sky colored by the sunrise and a large house with lights in the front.

photos.description: A street with more of that early morning glow.
photos.alt: A narrow street, lined with trees, reflecting the sunrise.

photos.description: Another morning shot with a mysterious orange glow.
photos.alt: A gray sky and a stone building on the left with a glow coming from out of frame.
A town across the bay in bright daylight.
